message: Embrace change and say yes to opportunities, even if they scare you
If you have to choose between being right and being kind, always choose kind

Surround yourself by people who bring the best out of you, inspire you, believe in you, create a circle if you fall they will catch you. 
There is no such thing as failure only lessons in life.
Its a small world and a long game: be kind
You are the CEO of your life, hire and fire accordingly
It's okay to quit! Life's too short for things that make you unhappy. Move on and find what serves you!
Those who mind don't matter those who matter dont mind
It's the choices you make not the chances you take that determine your destiny

Always make time to do things that make you happy and smile, even if it's alone! 
Know your own worth
When emotions are high, intelligence is low. Give yourself time to process things before responding or reacting.
Actions speak louder than words. Listen to what people say but if their actions don't match base your response on their   actions.
You are never stuck in your decisions, you have the right at any time to change your mind.
No one ever sat on their death bed and said "I should have spent more time at work and less time with my family"
Always have a way to get home - no matter where in the world you are

Be patient with your own time and energy! Not everything happens fast or when you want it to. 
Treat yourself as you would treat others - with kindness
A kind heart will outlast looks any day
The world doesn't owe you anything... reward comes from effort, wisdom comes from learning.

Good, better, best,
never let it rest,
until your good is better
and your better Best.
